page.title: 09Children's recreation
page.content:
A SURVEY OF CHILDREN' ACTIVITIES AT BALGOWAN JUNIOR SCHOOL.
Football 86 Tunnels 1 Rounders 3 Talking 1 Piggy in the middle 2 Netball 3 Skipping 17 Dodge ball 4 Red rover 1 Tennis 1 Chain Hee 15 It 18 Donkey 1 kiss chase 5 Stuck in the mud 9 Foxes and hounds 4 Card games 2 Meetings 2 He-man 1 Swaps 1 Talking 1 Climbing on walls 1 Walking with teacher 1 Marines 3 Star wars 2 Care bears 2 Knight riders 2 Feet off ground 3 Sea ponies 1 Racing 1 Air wolf 1 Muncher ,muncher 1 Adventure games 1 4.40 5 Railings 5 Hopscotch 2 Bombs 1
